description: The Melody Ear Band is the perfect accessory for chilly morning runs, shoulder season hikes, or simply keeping hair neat and organized. ActiveTemp™ technology, a thermo-regulating treatment, adjusts to tempo and body output level and helps to control core temperature. The ruching at the center front gives a subtle touch of style, and the breathable, wicking, quick-drying fabric wicks away sweat as the pace quickens. Ideal for cool weather active pursuits, the Melody Ear Band is a performance-based, functional solution for regulating body temperature while pushing limits.
name: Melody Ear Band - Womens

specs.value: 87% Polyester, 13% Spandex Brushed Space Dye Jersey
